result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Touzong P. Thao

records.addlTxt: w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk: Amanda. 
Case called at 4:28 pm. 
State appears by ADA Cody Marschall.  Defendant appears, with Attorney Peter Vu. 

Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.

State moves to REMOVE the domestic abuse enhancer. 

COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA to Ct.1>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises defendant of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & questions defendant to understanding; 
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & voluntary made, a factual basis;

COURT withholds finding and entry of guilt - Court adopts written Deferred Entry of Judgment agreement as signed by all parties and submitted to the Court.
COURT defers matter for a period of 12 months/years for Defendant to comply with all terms and conditions of written DEOJ agreement.
If defendant is in full compliance with all terms and conditions within that time frame and obtains no new criminal charges, State to DISMISS Ct.1;

DEOJ RH set for 9/25/23 at 9:00 am.
Bond continues.

Adj: 4:34 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 26, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

Clerk: Amanda. 
Case Called at 8:32 am. 
State appears by ADA Cody Marschall.  Defendant appears, and with Attorney Peter Vu.
VRCW. 

Attorney Vu is requesting another date. 

NEXT DATE:
Plea/Sentencing set for 9/26 at 4:00 pm. 

Adj: 8:33 am.

ADA Cody Marschall appears in person; Deft appears in person with Atty Vu
No new dates - FPT to remain 8/31

records.addlTxt: No VIOLENT contact with victim(s): P.T. & V.T.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.

Clerk: Amanda.
Case called at 2:12 pm.
State appears by ADA Cody Marschall. Defendant appears, pro se.
Date and Time set for IA; VRCW. 

Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 

PLEA:  NOT GUILTY. 

COURT ORDERS: $250 signature bond - CONDITIONS: 
- No VIOLENT contact with victim(s): P.T. & V.T. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
